IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PREPARE STUDENTS OF PROMISE FOR A DYNAMIC WORLD THROUGH OUR DISTINCTIVE EXPERIENTIAL CURRICULUM WITHIN A SUPPORTIVE LEARNING COMMUNITY FOUNDED UPON THE BEST VALUES OF FAITH AND THE HUMAN SPIRIT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF CULVER-STOCKTON COLLEGE IS TO PREPARE STUDENTS OF PROMISE FOR A DYNAMIC WORLD THROUGH OUR DISTINCTIVE EXPERIENTIAL CURRICULUM WITHIN A SUPPORTIVE LEARNING COMMUNITY FOUNDED UPON THE BEST VALUES OF FAITH AND THE HUMAN SPIRIT.
IRS990.Desc: EDUCATION: APPROXIMATELY 900 STUDENTS ENROLLED IN 30 MAJOR ACADEMIC PROGRAMS AND 10 PRE-PROFESSIONAL PROGRAMS

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: AUXILIARY ENTERPRISES FOR THE BENEFIT OF STUDENTS (RESIDENCE HALLS, DINING HALL, ETC.): APPROXIMATELY 660 STUDENTS

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: ASSETS HELD IN TRUST BY OTHERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE HELD TO PROVIDE INVESTMENT EARNINGS TO BE USED FOR VARIOUS COLLEGE NEEDS OR FOR THE PURPOSE SPECIFIED BY THE DONOR. THE MAJORITY OF ENDOWMENT EARNINGS ARE USED FOR SCHOLARSHIPS.
BOOKSTORE COST OF SALES 55450. RENTAL EXPENSES 15895.
BOOKSTORE COST OF SALES 55450. RENTAL EXPENSES 15895.
INCLUDED IN COLLEGE CATALOG AND FINANCIAL AID LITERATURE
CULVER STOCKTON COLLEGE RECEIVES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FROM THE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION. THIS ASSISTANCE INCLUDES PELL GRANTS, DIRECT LOANS, WORK STUDY, SEOG AND TEACH PROGRAMS.
THE COLLEGE MAINTAINS RECORDS WITHIN ITS FINANCIAL AID SOFTWARE TO ACCOUNT FOR ALL GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO EACH STUDENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD REVIEWS THE 990 ON ITS WEBSITE BEFORE ITS FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD IS REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ANNUALLY WITH A QUESTIONNAIRE PROVIDED TO THEM. ANY CONFLICTS WILL BE HANDLED AS NECESSARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES' PERFORMANCE COMMITTEE ACCESSES THE CURRENT CUPA-HR ADMINISTRATIVE SURVEY, OTHER GENERALLY AVAILABLE SALARY SURVEY DATA, AND TOGETHER WITH A REVIEW OF MIDWESTERN PEER COLLEGE PRESIDENTIAL COMPENSATION LEVELS, SETS THE COMPENSATION OF A NEW PRESIDENT. ANNUALLY THEREAFTER, THIS COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE PRESIDENT'S LAST YEAR'S PERFORMANCE, AND IN ASSOCIATION WITH UPDATED CUPA-HR SALARY SURVEY INFORMATION SETS THE NEXT YEAR'S COMPENSATION LEVEL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND POLICIES ARE AVAILABLE BY REQUEST AT THE OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION AND FINANCE.

THE COLLEGE HAS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE THAT IS CHARGED WITH SELECTING, MONITORING AND RETAINING AN INDEPENDENT AUDITOR. THEY ARE ALSO RESPONSIBLE FOR REVIEWING THE AUDIT REPORT AND DISCUSSING THIS WITH THE AUDITOR.
